node.detail_zh: 患者有長期病患，獨居於北角錦屏街 40-78 號鴻福大樓。她自 2 月 25 日出現間歇咳嗽，2 月 26 日到柏立基夫人普通科門診診所求醫，2 月 27 日患者的深喉唾液樣本呈陽性反應，獲安排往伊利沙伯醫院入院接受治療。於潛伏期內沒有外遊，但於 1 月 25 日以及 2 月 1 日至 12 日期間多次到訪「福慧精舍」佛堂。
node.detail_en: The patient with underlying illness who lives alone in Hung Fuk Building, 40-78 Kam Ping Street, North Point. She developed occasional cough since Feb 25. She sought medical attention at Anne Black General Out-patient Clinic on Feb 26. Her deep throat saliva specimen was tested positive on Feb 26 and was arranged to be admitted to Queen Elizabeth Hospital for treatment. The patient had no travel history during the incubation period but she visited Fook Wai Ching She on Jan 25 and several times between Feb 1-12.
node.classification_zh: 可能本地個案的密切接觸者
node.group_description_zh: 「福慧精舍」佛堂位於北角美輪大廈，相關患者包括佛堂工作人員及善信。「福慧精舍」是本港第三宗超級傳播事件。福群組患者中，最早病發日期是 2 月 8 日。
node.group_description_en: "Fook Wai Ching She" is a Buddhist preaching hall located in Maylun Apartments, North Point. Related infected patients include staff members and followers. This is the third case of super-spreader. The case was first discovered on Feb 8.

node.location_zh: 錦屏街 40-78 號鴻福大樓
node.location_en: Hung Fuk Building, 40-78 Kam Ping Street
node.remarks_zh: 2 月 25 日起出現間歇咳嗽

node.location_zh: 柏立基夫人普通科門診診所
書局街 1-25 號美輪大廈福慧精舍
node.location_en: Fook Wai Ching She, Maylun Apartments, 1-25 Shu Kuk Street
node.remarks_zh: 於 1 月 25 日以及 2 月 1 日至 12 日期間多次到訪
node.remarks_en: Visited the preaching hall on Jan 25 and on many occasions during Feb 1-12
